VBA Developer

Posted: 2025-10-11

Expires: 2025-10-25

Active
Join our team now! We are hiring “VBA Developer” at Systems Limited! Job Responsibilities: Develop, optimize, and maintain VBA code to automate processes across Excel, IBM DB2/SQL, iSeries (AS/400), and other Microsoft Office applications. Design and implement macros, user forms, and user-defined functions to enhance workflow efficiency. Analyze business requirements and translate them into effective and scalable VBA automation solutions. Debug, test, and troubleshoot VBA scripts to ensure accuracy, reliability, and performance. Integrate VBA solutions with external data sources such as ODBC/SQL Server, DB2, APIs, and CSV files. Automate IBM iSeries (AS/400) green screen tasks using VBA with IBM Personal Communications, including data entry, navigation, and transaction processing. Document code, workflows, and automation processes to ensure maintainability and knowledge sharing. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements, provide technical support, and deliver automation solutions aligned with business needs. Continuously optimize existing VBA solutions to improve performance and adapt to changing business environments. Interested candidates can share their resumes at talent@systemsltd.com and mention the job title in the subject line.
📍 Karachi📍 Lahore📍 Multan📍 Faisalabad📍 Islamabad#VBA Developer🧳 Experienced Required
